definition: variant of 收穫|收获[shou1 huo4]
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
you get what you put in/you reap what you sow
pinyin: yi1 fen1 geng1 yun2 , yi1 fen1 shou1 huo4

definition: not expecting any reward/not asking for favors
The sooner you set to work, the sooner you'll reap the rewards. (idiom)
pinyin: zao3 dong4 shou3 , zao3 shou1 huo4

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些农业村庄也从可乐豆木上收获毛虫。

sentences.english: It assures us a promising season of summer and also the most iportant havvest season-autum.
sentences.chinese: 它承诺我们夏天和最重要的收获的季节秋天。

sentences.english: Cassava is a starch crop of which the product harvested is the root tubers.
sentences.chinese: 木薯是淀粉作物，收获的产品主要是块根。

sentences.english: I wish you all the best pictures you can get and a ton of happy customers.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿你们都有好前景，收获一大堆的快乐顾客。

sentences.english: Some people like to harvest the plants when the chilies are green.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喜欢在辣椒尚绿的时候收获辣椒。

sentences.english: Sometimes I’ve had treble the amount of fruit and the quality of fruit is better too.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我能收获三倍的水果，而且水果质量更高。

sentences.english: It is thetime for me to help my family for harvest.
sentences.chinese: 是时候帮助家人收获了。

sentences.english: What have you gained from the China Cup 2011?
sentences.chinese: 你通过参加本届中国杯收获了什么？

sentences.english: The cells were harvested and microscope slides were prepared before Giemsa staining.
sentences.chinese: 收获细胞及制玻片后，姬姆萨染液染色。

sentences.english: But I believe I gained a lot by delaying my sex life.
sentences.chinese: 但我相信，正是延迟了性生活，我得到很多的收获。

sentences.english: Altruism is another big draw to the company garden.
sentences.chinese: 利他主义是公司菜园的另一大收获。

sentences.english: Currently it is the high season to harvest narcissus bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 那现在正好是水仙收获的季节。

sentences.english: Two farm workers were rushed to the hospital after being poisoned by pesticides while harvesting grapes.
sentences.chinese: 两个农场工人在收获葡萄时农药中毒而被急送医院。

sentences.english: Putting back after the new, she also published, but no harvest.
sentences.chinese: 回新后，她还刊登了寻人启事，可惜都没有收获。

sentences.english: Dr. Howard will be even greater strength and greater faith in the fruits of harvest.
sentences.chinese: 华博士将以更大的实力和信念收获更大的果实。

sentences.english: Now I already had a special measuring instrument, it is not only the amount of the amount of harvest process.
sentences.chinese: 现在我已有了一种特别的量具，它不量收获只量过程。

definition: to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
to give to/to provide to/to bring to/to take to
